description: It seems like more and more websites these days are trying to infect your computer with malicious spyware. You can become infected simply by viewing a page even if you haven't clicked on a link! So, how can you protect yourself from these types of viruses? The answer is knowledge. Only by knowing where to look and how to remove them will you be able to guard your computer from infection. Take the worry out of browsing online with the How To Protect Yourself From Adware And Spyware ebook. Learn about browser security, web safety, and what software virus your windows based computer is most vulnerable to. Download this book today!
